4. Occiput rounded without carina ...........................................................

5. Mid lobe of mesoscutum clearly situated above level of base of scutellum (a leveled gap present); frons finely coriaceous with some transverse wrinkles above antennae .....

Synopeas euryale (Walker, 1835)
